data.author: Robert Stanica

changelog.release_notes: Critical messages are now displayed. These messages may be shown in the case that a transit system is no longer supported.
Initial release. Supports all of the transit systems used by NextBus.

data.description:
Get the arrival times of the nearest buses to your location. Choose one of the following transit systems from app settings:

AC Transit
APL
Asheville Redefines Transit
Camarillo Area (CAT)
Cape Cod Regional Transit Authority
Chapel Hill Transit
Charles River TMA - EZRide
Charm City Circulator
City College NYC

CyRide
